item.title: Officers involved in shooting in Pennsylvania, officials say
item.description: "Please send prayers to the officers and those involved in the shooting in York County," Pennsylvania Lt. Gov. Austin Davis said on X.

item.title: Trump greeted by king, thousands of protesters in UK visit
item.description: President Donald Trump kicked off his state visit to the U.K. on Wednesday by traveling to Windsor Castle to meet with King Charles III.

item.title: Fed cuts interest rates for 1st time in Trump's 2nd term
item.description: The central bank aims to revive a flagging labor market.
